MemberSignature.Value: public Android.Media.MediaDrm.CryptoSession GetCryptoSession (byte[] sessionId, string cipherAlgorithm, string macAlgorithm);
.method public hidebysig instance class Android.Media.MediaDrm/CryptoSession GetCryptoSession(unsigned int8[] sessionId, string cipherAlgorithm, string macAlgorithm) cil managed
member this.GetCryptoSession : byte[] * string * string -> Android.Media.MediaDrm.CryptoSession

Docs.param: the session ID for the session containing keys to be used for encrypt, decrypt, sign and/or verify
the algorithm to use for encryption and decryption ciphers. The algorithm string conforms to JCA Standard Names for Cipher Transforms and is case insensitive. For example "AES/CBC/NoPadding".

the algorithm to use for sign and verify The algorithm string conforms to JCA Standard Names for Mac Algorithms and is case insensitive. For example "HmacSHA256".
The list of supported algorithms for a DRM engine plugin can be obtained using the method with the property name "algorithms".
Docs.summary: Obtain a CryptoSession object which can be used to encrypt, decrypt, sign and verify messages or data using the session keys established for the session using methods Android.Media.MediaDrm.getKeyRequest(byte[],byte[],java.lang.String,int,java.util.HashMap java.lang.String,java.lang.String ) and using a session key server.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.param: The UUID of the crypto scheme.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool IsCryptoSchemeSupported (Java.Util.UUID uuid, string mimeType);
.method public static hidebysig bool IsCryptoSchemeSupported(class Java.Util.UUID uuid, string mimeType) cil managed
static member IsCryptoSchemeSupported : Java.Util.UUID * string -> bool

Docs.param: The UUID of the crypto scheme.
The MIME type of the media container, e.g. "video/mp4" or "video/webm"
Docs.summary: Query if the given scheme identified by its UUID is supported on this device, and whether the drm plugin is able to handle the media container format specified by mimeType.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.MediaDrmKeyType KeyTypeOffline = (2)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Media.MediaDrmKeyType enum directly instead of this field.")

Docs.summary: This key request type specifies that the keys will be for offline use, they will be saved to the device for use when the device is not connected to a network.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.MediaDrmKeyType KeyTypeStreaming = (1)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Media.MediaDrmKeyType enum directly instead of this field.")

Docs.summary: This key request type species that the keys will be for online use, they will not be saved to the device for subsequent use when the device is not connected to a network.

MemberSignature.Value: public byte[] ProvideKeyResponse (byte[] scope, byte[] response);
.method public hidebysig instance unsigned int8[] ProvideKeyResponse(unsigned int8[] scope, unsigned int8[] response) cil managed

Docs.param: may be a sessionId or keySetId depending on the type of the response. Scope should be set to the sessionId when the response is for either streaming or offline key requests. Scope should be set to the keySetId when the response is for a release request.
the byte array response from the server
Docs.summary: A key response is received from the license server by the app, then it is provided to the DRM engine plugin using provideKeyResponse.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if the response indicates that reprovisioning is required
if the response indicates that the server rejected the request

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ProvideProvisionResponse(unsigned int8[] response) cil managed

Docs.param: the opaque provisioning response byte array to provide to the DRM engine plugin.
Docs.summary: After a provision response is received by the app, it is provided to the DRM engine plugin using this method.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if the response indicates that the server rejected the request
